name: ts-react-hello-world
description: An RHMAP Hello World application written using TypeScript and React

scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run serve
scripts.serve:
echo 'View your application at - http://localhost:8080/?url=http://localhost:8001
' && concurrently 'http-server ./www -c -1' 'watchify -e src/index.js -o www/bundle.js --no-bundle-external --debug --verbose' 'tsc -w'
scripts.compile: tsc && npm run bundle-js && npm run vendor-js
scripts.vendor-js: browserify -o www/vendor.js -r fh-js-sdk -r fastclick -r react-dom -r react
scripts.ios-sim: npm run compile && cordova platform add ios ; && cordova run ios --emulator
scripts.android-sim: npm run compile && cordova platform add android ; cordova run android --emulator

author: Evan Shortiss
